Brightman, Thomas, 1562-1607. Judgement or prophesies, what shall befall Germany, Scotland, Holland, and the churches adhering to them.

notesStmt.note: A free epitome in prose and verse, with interpolations of Thomas Brightman's "Apocalypsis Apocalypseos" 1609, chapters 3-4. This is a different work from "Reverend Mr. Brightmans iudgement or prophesies" 1641, and "An epitome of Mr. Brightman his exposition upon the Revelation" 1644.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
